name: The Lamest Game Ever
description:
When You Watch KBC Too Much on your Television and suddenly one night you come drunk at your home, sleep and suddenly your mind is now a game show ??? 🤔

Welcome To The Lamest Game Ever Because The Game is absolutely pointless, senseless and worst of all.... LAMEEEEE!!!!!!! 😂

Where Fire Extinguishers are Flamethrowers and AK-47 is used to play Holi 😅

So GET READY TO PLAY THE WORST AND THE LAMEST GAME EVER WHERE THINGS ARE NOT SUPPOSED TO DO WHAT THEY ARE MEANT TO BE..... LIKE THIS GAME IS NOT MEANT FOR PLAYING..... I GUESS....😂

Made By Rounak Choudhary and Ayush Singh

P.S. During the Game Jam,  I (Rounak) suffered from a fever so the game was actually having a different ending and something more but yupp..... I guess this is what this game is 😅. But I promise, we will definitely bring the remake of this game where you are going to see voicelines, pokeballs, anime and more Barney references 😅. So Do Support 🔥
